channel.title: Llama on Arian's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Llama on Arian's blog

item.title: AI on a laptop
item.description: The AI craze is going strong. You would think it’d be over by now, but big boy companies keep throwing their money at Nvidia GPUs and overpriced LLM subscriptions. For the average Joe, GPT4 and GPT4o are more than enough to do your day-to-day tasks or if you’re a developer, you can just have OpenAI’s API do everything you’re too lazy to do. This all comes at a cost: Data privacy Are you okay sending your or your company’s data to OpenAI’s servers, even if they don’t use it to train their future model?
